basic.description: Continued study of the theory and practice of dramatic arts education. Candidates will continue to explore the educational value of dramatic expression with a particular focus on long term planning. Consideration will be given to aspects of curriculum design, unit planning and the assessment of student achievement in a unit, topics in drama for unit development, and issues related to the experience of a novice educator.
basic.subject: CURR
basic.title: Dramatic Arts (IS)
